# Quick Start Guide for SigBridgeR

```{r,prework,eval=FALSE}
if (!requireNamespace("remotes")) {
  install.packages("remotes")
}
remotes::install_github("WangLabCSU/SigBridgeR")

library(SigBridgeR)
packageVersion("SigBridgeR")
```
